sen.j: 蔵賀（ぞうが、延喜17年（917年） - 長保5年6月9日 (旧暦)（1003年7月10日））は、平安時代中期の天台宗の僧。
sen.e: Zoga (917- Jul.10, 1003) was a Tendai sect monk in the middle of the Heian Period.
Zoga (917- Jul.10, 1003) was a Tendai sect monk in the middle of the Heian Period.
Zoga (917- July 16, 1003) was a Tendai sect monk in the middle of the Heian period.
sen.cmt: Jul.10→July 16に修正 (グレゴリオ暦)、Periodの頭文字を小文字に修正

sen.e: His father was the Sangi, Tsunehira TACHIBANA.
His father was the Sangi, Tsunehira TACHIBANA.
His father was the Sangi (royal advisor), Tsunehira TACHIBANA.

sen.j: 多武峰先徳（とうのみねせんとく）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: He was also called Tonominesentoku.
He was also called Tonominesentoku.
He was also called Tonomine Sentoku.

sen.j: 比叡山で慈恵大師（元三大師）良源に師事して天台教学を学んだ。
sen.e: He was apprenticed to Jie Daishi (Gensan Daishi) Ryogen and studied Tendai sect studies.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He was an apprenticed to Jie Daishi (Gensan Daishi) Ryogen and participated in Tendai sect studies.
He was an apprenticed to Jie Daishi (Gensan Daishi) Ryogen and participated in Tendai sect studies.

sen.j: 963年（応和3年）藤原高光の勧めで多武峰（奈良県桜井市）に住し、「摩訶止観」「法華文句」を講じ、「法華玄義鈔」「無限念仏観」などを著した。
sen.e: In 963, he lived in Tonomine (Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture) at the recommendation of FUJIWARA no Takamitsu and taught "Makashikan" "Hokke mungu" and wrote "Hokkegengisho""Mugennennbutsukan"

sen.e: In 963, he lived in Tonomine (Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture) at the recommendation of FUJIWARA no Takamitsu and taught "Makashikan," "Hokke mungu," and wrote "Hokkegengisho," "Mugennennbutsukan."

In 963, he lived in Tonomine (Sakurai City, Nara Prefecture) at the recommendation of FUJIWARA no Takamitsu and taught 'Makashikan' (Mahayana Practice of Cessation and Contemplation), 'Hokke Mongu' (Words and Phrases of the Lotus Sutra) and wrote 'Hokkegengisho,' 'Mugennennbutsukan.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを半角、シングルに修正、「摩訶止観」「法華文句」の表記を修正 (用語集参照)

sen.j: また、毎年四半期ごとに法華三昧を修した。
sen.e: He trained and finished the Hokezanmai every three months throughout the year.
He trained and finished the Hokezanmai every three months throughout the year.
He trained and finished the Hokke-zanmai (Dharma-Lotus Samadhi) every three months throughout the year.
sen.cmt: 「法華三昧」の表記を修正 (用語集参照)

sen.j: 一方不動供（不動明王を供養する修法）などの修法や法華経読誦を行い奇瑞を現したという。
sen.e: On the other hand, he is also said to have performed miracles by zuho such as Fudoho (zuho celebrating the Fudo Myoo) and Hokekyo readings.
On the other hand, he is also said to have performed miracles by zuho such as Fudoho (zuho celebrating the Fudo Myoo) and Hokekyo readings.
On the other hand, he is also said to have performed miracles by zuho such as Fudo-gu (zuho celebrating the Fudo Myoo) and Hokke-kyo Sutra readings.
sen.cmt: Fudoho→Fudo-gu (参照: http://katohjuk-web.hp.infoseek.co.jp/aduma29c-12.htm)、Hokekyo readings→Hokke-kyo Sutra readingsとしました。

sen.j: 高い名誉や利権を嫌い、奇行譚を多く残した。
sen.e: He did not like honor or concessions and left many interesting stories.
He did not like honor or concessions and left many interesting stories.
